緂字的基本解释

緂
tián
衣服色彩鲜明。
古书上说的一种纺织品。
缉，搓：“緂麻索缕。”

緂
tǎn
苍白色。

緂
chān
女衣。

緂字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tián］
(1)搓麻。
(2)织物名。

緂字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　緂； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页928第20
【廣韻】他酣切，音聃。【說文】白鮮衣貌。謂衣采色鮮也。【淮南子·汜論訓】緂麻索縷。　又【廣韻】處占切，音幨。義同。　又【集韻】充含切。又充甘切。義同。　又【廣韻】吐敢切，音菼。靑黃色。【類篇】帛騅色。

緂字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
緂字的起名意思

暂无。

緂
Basic explanation of words
緂
tián
The clothes are brightly colored.
A kind of textile mentioned in ancient books.
Chi, rubbing: "The hemp and the rope."
緂
tǎn
Pale.
緂
chān
Women's clothing.
緂
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tián］
(1) Rub hemp.
(2) Fabric name.
緂
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　緂; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 928 20
[Guang Yun] He is hearty and sound. 【Said the text】White fresh clothes appearance. That the clothes are fresh in color. [Huinanzi·Pun Lun Xun] Threads of hemp.　[Guangyun] Everywhere is occupied and cut, and the sound is unreliable. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] is full of excitement. And full of sweet cuts. The same meaning.　[Guangyun] Spit and dare to cut, sound 菼. Yellow. [Classes] Silk color.
